name: Timesheet - Replicon Web (Calibri) +
description:
Replicon's Timesheet used by many companies, but with added Calibri Vista fonts, and some updated user interface.

Additional Information:
- Bolds the Calendar headings for better readability
- Calibri default font - Still supports XP machines with Arial
- Sets default font to 10px


Instructions:
- If needed, change the moz-document prefix to match your company's URL.

About:image - I am sorry about the image, but I needed to black-out some sensitive information.  These black lines will not show up on your Replicon Time Sheet.


Changelog:
1.0.0.1:
+ Added more noticable highlighting to the Current Week's days in the calendar.  - They are now Underlined with a Blue line.
+ This makes finding the current week that much easier
